signout.title: Sign out?
signout.description: Are you sure you want to sign out?

map.chooseWellbeingMessage: To see the map you need to inform us of your well-being. Please update it in the form.

form.topNote: Please keep your well-being status up to date. You can choose one of the following options.

well.label: Feeling Well
well.description: I have not been tested but don't show any of the coronavirus (COVID-19) symptoms. All is well!

symptoms.label: Showing Symptoms
symptoms.description: I have not been tested and I am feeling unwell. I think I am showing some of the coronavirus (COVID-19) symptoms.
symptoms.important: Please note that if you choose this option, we will display your approximate location and your well-being status on the map in order to encourage other users to self-distance. We will never share information that may reveal your identity.
symptoms.note: It may prove helpful to choose this option even if your symptoms are mild.

negative.label: Tested Negative
negative.description: I have been tested. According to the results, I don't have coronavirus (COVID-19).

positive.label: Tested Positive
positive.description: I have been tested. According to the results, I have coronavirus (COVID-19).
positive.important: Please note that if you choose this option, we will display your approximate location on the map in order to encourage other users to self-distance. We will never share your identity.
